name: asset
description: Information about a compute asset such as a workstation, laptop, phone, virtual desktop, or VM.

children.name: asset_id
children.description: The asset ID. Value must contain the ':' character. For example, cs:abcdd23434.

children.name: attribute
children.description: Generic entity metadata attributes of the asset.

children.name: category
children.description: The category of the asset (for example, 'End User Asset', 'Workstation', 'Server').

children.name: creation_time
children.description: Time the asset was created or provisioned. Deprecated: use Attribute instead.

children.name: deployment_status
children.description: The deployment status of the asset for device lifecycle purposes.

children.name: first_discover_time
children.description: Time the asset was first discovered by asset management/discoverability software.

children.name: first_seen_time
children.description: The first observed time for an asset, calculated based on the first time the identifier was observed.

children.name: hardware
children.description: The asset hardware specifications.

children.name: hostname
children.description: Asset hostname or domain name field.

children.name: ip
children.description: A list of IP addresses associated with an asset.

children.name: labels
children.description: Metadata labels for the asset. Deprecated: use Attribute instead.

children.name: last_boot_time
children.description: Time the asset was last boot started.

children.name: last_discover_time
children.description: Time the asset was last discovered by asset management/discoverability software.

children.name: location
children.description: Location of the asset.

children.name: mac
children.description: List of MAC addresses associated with an asset.

children.name: nat_ip
children.description: List of NAT IP addresses associated with an asset.

children.name: network_domain
children.description: The network domain of the asset (for example, 'corp.acme.com').

children.name: platform_software
children.description: The asset operating system platform software.

children.name: product_object_id
children.description: A vendor-specific identifier to uniquely identify the entity (a GUID or similar).

children.name: software
children.description: The asset software details.

children.name: system_last_update_time
children.description: Time the asset system or OS was last updated.

children.name: type
children.description: The type of asset (for example, workstation, laptop, server).

children.name: vulnerabilities
children.description: Vulnerabilities discovered on asset.
